page.title: 16TOURISM - WEST LEOMINSTER
page.content: The district west of Leominster attracts tourists both from the U.K. and abroad, some passing through and others staying in the area to explore further. Many houses and farms do bed and breakfast and there is a Camping Club campsite. Many of the old stone farm barns have been converted into holiday cottages, for the increasingly popular self-catering holidays. This locality is a good central point from which to tour as many tourist attractions, including two National Trust properties, are within a fifteen mile radius.
